summary: Alpha gate shakeout finished with build, health, and tests marked as environment-limited warnings; missing python -m build, docker/FFmpeg/SoX tooling, the sandbox requests shim, and coverage badge generation were logged without aborting the run.

phases.name: health
phases.details: Missing tools: docker sox ffmpeg aria2c; requests client unavailable

phases.name: tests
phases.details: Coverage export skipped because coverage badge generation failed
